item.title: Blossom Branch, Degree Show Piece
item.description: Blossom Branch is an adapted project for the Digital Arts Computing Degree Show 2020. A mechanical sculpture made up of wire, 3D printing, an arduino, servo and fallen branches, completed in lockdown during COVID-19 pandemic. Video of the piece and accompanying audio track for context found on the link.
